title: 45 Gifts That Are $50 or Under (and Look Way More Expensive Than They Actually Are)
description: The best gift giver isn’t necessarily the one who spends the most.
excerpt: These are the best gifts under $50 that match your recipient’s desire for elegance, fun, and practicality. Shop fashion, beauty, home, work, travel, and more.
text: The Bright BouquetBouqs Full of GraceFresh flowers are a classic gift. These come with the convenience of fast delivery.A Funny CardSmythson Lobsters Valentine's Day CardWrite sweet (and funny) little love letter to your special person with Smythson’s brilliant cards. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowA Perfect CandleSanta Maria Novella Rosa CandleSkip the traditional flowers and give something that will last much longer—like this rose-scented candle.The Soft PJsNordstrom Moonlight Eco Crop PajamasHere's something to cozy up in for those Netflix and chill type of nights.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowA Coffee Table Book Hermès Pop Up BookA gift from Hermès? For me? You shouldn’t have, but I’m so glad you did...A Red LipstickDior Rouge DiorFor the perfect kiss, start with Dior’s bestselling lipstick. Make it extra special with custom engraving offered by the brand. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowMadewell The Ezra Velvet SlipperHelp them relax in style at home with these pink trimmed olive velvet slippers.A Sweet SnackCompartés California Berries Gourmet Chocolate BarSatisfy any sweet cravings with this assortment fruit-filled chocolate bar.Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowA Cute Cooler Bag Calpak Travel Insulated Lunch BagFor the coworker who always packs her lunch, this cinched cooler is just darling. Fresh HerbsThe Sill Garden Jar Duo, Basil + RosemaryBring the garden to them even in the dead of winter with these hydroponic grow jars, which happen to look very cute, too. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowA C-CompactChanel Double Mirrored Compact An elegant lady should always have a compact in her bag, and few could be more refined that this one from Chanel. An Iconic Treat Levain 8-Pack Signature Cookie AssortmentIf you’ve spent any time in New York City, you know about Levain’s scrumptious goodies, and thus, why they make such a crowd-pleasing present. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowRelaxing SoakL'Occitane Lavender Foaming BathThe gift of relaxation is hard to beat. A Fresh Journal Papier In the Grid Lined Notebook You can never wrong with well designed stationery. For artful covers and free personalization at a great price, Papier is the place to beat. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowThe Cozy ShoeDream Paris Genuine Suede Classic Platform BootsIt’s too cold outside. Wrap up a gift that’s cozy and trendy, thanks a platform sole. A Jewelry BoxBenevolence LA Plush Velvet Jewelry BoxWith luxe velvet, this jewelry box looks expensive, but it’s affordable enough to buy multiple for everyone on your list. Plus, it comes in several colors and is one of Oprah’s favorite things. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowA Stylish Yet Useful Tote Mango Shopper Bag with Double Handle This stylish tote is large enough to hold all of their office essentials or even accompany them on a weekend trip.A Leather Wallet Mark & Graham Leather Card CaseFew gifts are as universally practical as a leather cardholder. The Luxe SetYves Saint Laurent Libre Eau de Parfum Mini Duo SetTwo designer perfumes for 40 bucks? You really can’t beat that.
html:
The Bright Bouquet

Bouqs Full of Grace

Fresh flowers are a classic gift. These come with the convenience of fast delivery.

A Funny Card

Smythson Lobsters Valentine's Day Card

Write sweet (and funny) little love letter to your special person with Smythson’s brilliant cards.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Perfect Candle

Santa Maria Novella Rosa Candle

Skip the traditional flowers and give something that will last much longer—like this rose-scented candle.

The Soft PJs

Nordstrom Moonlight Eco Crop Pajamas

Here's something to cozy up in for those Netflix and chill type of nights.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Coffee Table Book

Hermès Pop Up Book

A gift from Hermès? For me? You shouldn’t have, but I’m so glad you did...

A Red Lipstick

Dior Rouge Dior

For the perfect kiss, start with Dior’s bestselling lipstick. Make it extra special with custom engraving offered by the brand.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Madewell The Ezra Velvet Slipper

Help them relax in style at home with these pink trimmed olive velvet slippers.

A Sweet Snack

Compartés California Berries Gourmet Chocolate Bar

Satisfy any sweet cravings with this assortment fruit-filled chocolate bar.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Cute Cooler Bag

Calpak Travel Insulated Lunch Bag

For the coworker who always packs her lunch, this cinched cooler is just darling.

Fresh Herbs

The Sill Garden Jar Duo, Basil + Rosemary

Bring the garden to them even in the dead of winter with these hydroponic grow jars, which happen to look very cute, too.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A C-Compact

Chanel Double Mirrored Compact

An elegant lady should always have a compact in her bag, and few could be more refined that this one from Chanel.

An Iconic Treat

Levain 8-Pack Signature Cookie Assortment

If you’ve spent any time in New York City, you know about Levain’s scrumptious goodies, and thus, why they make such a crowd-pleasing present.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Relaxing Soak

L'Occitane Lavender Foaming Bath

The gift of relaxation is hard to beat.

A Fresh Journal

Papier In the Grid Lined Notebook

You can never wrong with well designed stationery. For artful covers and free personalization at a great price, Papier is the place to beat.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

The Cozy Shoe

Dream Paris Genuine Suede Classic Platform Boots

It’s too cold outside. Wrap up a gift that’s cozy and trendy, thanks a platform sole.

A Jewelry Box

Benevolence LA Plush Velvet Jewelry Box

With luxe velvet, this jewelry box looks expensive, but it’s affordable enough to buy multiple for everyone on your list. Plus, it comes in several colors and is one of Oprah’s favorite things.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Stylish Yet Useful Tote

Mango Shopper Bag with Double Handle

This stylish tote is large enough to hold all of their office essentials or even accompany them on a weekend trip.

A Leather Wallet

Mark & Graham Leather Card Case

Few gifts are as universally practical as a leather cardholder.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Shower Luxury

Ceremonia Papaya Scalp Scrub

A scalp exfoliant is exactly the kind of small luxury that most people wouldn’t purchase for themselves, which makes it a great gift.

The Luxe Set

Yves Saint Laurent Libre Eau de Parfum Mini Duo Set

Two designer perfumes for 40 bucks? You really can’t beat that.
